info.title: Read information about a breadcrumb link in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnLastBreadcrumbLink
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Breadcrumb Example' link
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the 'Breadcrumb Example' link
testPageDocument.querySelector('[aria-current="page"]').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Breadcrumb Example' link, read information about the link.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Breadcrumb Example' link, read information about the link.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
